name: Black Forest Cake
description:
8" 3 tiered moist chocolate cake layered with vanilla cream and cherries.
Topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache.

name: Biscoff Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with a Biscoff filling and topping.

name: Carrot Cake Cheesecake
description: 9" nutty and spiced carrot cake swirled with creamy cheesecake.

name: Dark Chocolate and Crystallised Ginger Biscuits
description: Chunks of crystallised ginger and Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate.
